articles.description: The first trailer for Disney Plus’ upcoming Hawkeye show introduces Hailee Steinfeld as the new archer superhero, along with a lighter, Christmastime tone and Lucky the Pizza Dog. It’ll start streaming November 24th.
articles.content:
Celebrate the holidays with... Hawkeye?

articles.title: Katie Price turns to vitamin injections for energy boost after 'boozy' night at NTAs - Daily Mail
articles.description: Katie Price, 43, has admitted that she is 'tired and drained' following her 'boozy' appearance at the National Television Awards on Thursday.

articles.title: Our Yorkshire Farm's secret rift as daughter says she's been cut off from family - The Mirror
articles.description: The unknown daughter of Our Yorkshire Farm's Clive Owen, Rosie, claims she has been cut off from the family and that her relationship with her dad and stepmum Amanda is beyond repair
articles.content:
